text: is a Japanese athlete. He is best known as a marathon runner.Villar, Ruairidh. "Curvy dancing prepares Fujiwara for marathon," Reuters (UK). 12 March 2012; retrieved 2012-8-11. At the 2009 World Championships in Athletics at Berlin, Fujiwara finished 61st in the men's marathon. He finished second in the 2012 Tokyo Marathon.Belson, Ken. "As a Long-Distance Runner, Lonelier Than Most," New York Times (US). August 11, 2012; retrieved 2012-8-11. He was a member of the Japanese team in the 2012 Summer Olympics at London.London2012.com, Arata Fujiwara; retrieved 2012-8-11. == Related pages== * Sports in Japan * Japan at the Olympics ==References== ==Other websites== * Arata Fujiwara website * Arata Fujiwara at SportsReference.com Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese athletes Category:2012 Summer Olympics Category:Olympians for Japan
title: Arata Fujiwara
